attributes.action: Force MPs to sit the 2016 KS2 SATS. Expel any failing to meet expected standard
attributes.background: The current government have introduced new Key Stage 2 SATS tests for primary school children. The standard has been set so high that teachers think that only 20% will reach even the expected level.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament do not have the power to force MPs to sit the 2016 key stage 2 SATS.
